internalMedcine.underdoctorcare: Are you, or have you been, under the care of a doctor in the past

internalMedcine.Iffemale: If female, answer the questions below. Are you pregnant, or possibly pregnant
internalMedcine.specialrequestconcerningconsultation: If you have a special request concerning the consultation, check the box.
internalMedcine.informedonestimatedexpenses: I want to be informed of my estimated medical expenses in advance.
internalMedcine.interpreterinterpreterservice: I want to have an interpreter if an interpreter service is available.

obstetricGynecology.advisedbyanother: I was advised by another clinic/hospital (or at a regular check-up) to come here.
obstetricGynecology.menstrualperiods: I’d like to ask you about your menstrual periods.
obstetricGynecology.Howoldwereyouwhenyoustartedhavingyourper: How old were you when you started having your period?
obstetricGynecology.Howoldwereyouwhenyouhadyourlastperiod: How old were you when you had your last period?
obstetricGynecology.Howmanydayslongisyourmenstrualcycle: How many days long is your menstrual cycle?
obstetricGynecology.Howmanydaysdoperiodslastonaverage: How many days do periods last on average?
obstetricGynecology.painduringyourperiods: Do you have any pain during your periods?
obstetricGynecology.answeredYesandtakeapainkiller: If you answered 'Yes' and take a pain killer, write the name of that pain killer
obstetricGynecology.haveSexualIntercourse: Have you ever had sexual intercourse?
obstetricGynecology.hadsurgerybefore: *If you had a surgery before, write its date.
obstetricGynecology.takenBirthControlPills: Have you ever taken birth control pills?
obstetricGynecology.pregnantOrPossiblyPregnant: Are you pregnant or possibly pregnant?
obstetricGynecology.PregnantHistory: I’d like to ask you about past pregnancies. If you had Maternal and Child Health Handbook(s) for your past pregnancies, please be prepared to present them.
obstetricGynecology.pregnancyHistory: If you checked 'I had a pregnancy', write your pregnancy history below
obstetricGynecology.problemDuringDelivery: Did you have any problems during your pregnancy or delivery?
obstetricGynecology.haveBabyAtThisHuspital: If you are pregnant, would you like to have the baby at this hospital?

covid-19.checkBoxApplicable: A) Please check the box that is applicable to you (yes or no).
covid-19.checkBoxApplicable1: Have you or a family member living with you ever been in the same room with a person infected with a new type of coronavirus within the past two weeks?
covid-19.checkBoxApplicable2: Have you visited outside the province (including overseas) within  the past two weeks?
covid-19.checkBoxApplicable3: Have you been to a poorly ventilated, enclosed place (karaoke, snack bar, etc.) with a large number of people within the past two weeks?
covid-19.haveSymptoms: B) Do you have any of the symptoms that apply to you?
covid-19.Abnormalityinthesenseofsmell: Abnormality in the sense of smell
covid-19.Unabletoappreciatetaste: Unable to appreciate the taste of food and drinks
